Level 28
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 28
By Y.K.TAN on Wednesday, May 15, 2002 - 12:39 am:

LEVEL 28

At the start of the stage,quickly go below the metal ledge and seal yourself in. Preventing the two blue monsters from entering. Search around by creating boxes and destroying them,and you'll find some fireworks. Free yourself and use those fireworks WISELY and killing the enemies,the main purpose is two kill the two blue monsters,if you have some more fire works left,kill the duckens. If not,if you have not enough fire works,go up normally and get the key,using a box to block the attacks from the ducken as easy as usual. Use blocks to block the ducken's attacks. And get your key and get back to the gate(Self explainery on how to get to a gate and the key,lol)
